result.purpose: Responsible for defining models and structures related to notification types and handling push notifications.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related functionalities into separate files for clarity and maintainability.

internal/domains/notification/models/apn.purpose: Defines push notification types for Apple Push Notification service (APNs).

internal/domains/notification/models/con.purpose: Defines constant values used in the notification domain.

internal/domains/notification/models/mes.purpose: Defines the PostNotificationMessage structure and methods for handling notification messages.

internal/domains/notification/models/pus.purpose: Defines models and structures for handling push notifications.
